text: Shrimp toast or prawn toast is a Chinese dim sum dish. It is small triangles of bread, brushed with egg and topped with chopped shrimp and water chestnuts.The Glory of Southern Cooking: Recipes for the Best Beer-Battered Fried ... - James Villas - Google Books It is baked or deep fried. It is often served as an appetizer in Chinese restaurants in Australia and the United States.Shrimp Toast is Nothing to Pu-Pu - WSJ.com In some countries, such as the United Kingdom and Australia, sesame seeds are sometimes sprinkled on the dish before it is baked or deep fried. ==References== Category:Seafood dishes Category:Chinese food
title: Shrimp toast
